mapper.insert: insert into alarm(user_id, sender, roomid, al_content, al_date, al_chk) values( #{user_id}, #{sender}, #{roomid}, #{al_content},now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select alarm.user_id, alarm.sender, alarm.roomid, alarm.al_content, alarm.al_date, alarm.al_chk, chtroom.house_num as "housenum",COUNT(*) AS roomid_count from alarm, chtroom where alarm.al_chk = 0 AND alarm.user_id = #{user_id} and alarm.roomid = chtroom.roomid and alarm.roomid = any(select roomid from alarm where user_id = #{user_id}) Group by alarm.roomid;
mapper.update: update alarm set al_chk = 1 where user_id = #{user_id} and roomid= #{roomid} and al_chk = 0
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT room.house_num FROM chtroom AS room, alarm AS alarm WHERE room.roomid = alarm.roomid AND alarm.roomid = #{roomid}
